meaning_str.bing:
n. 论文；物件；（协议、契约的）条款
v. 列举(罪状)；控告；把…逐条登载；用条款约束
网络. 文章；冠词；物品

论文；物件；（协议、契约的）条款
列举(罪状)；控告；把…逐条登载；用条款约束

文章；（报刊上的）论文；物品；物件；（协议、契约的）条款；规定；条文；报道；冠词
订约将…收为学徒（或徒弟）；签订协议；以协议（或契约）约束；担任学徒；使受协议条款的约束；定约雇用进行控告；提出罪状（或指责）

sogou-kaoyan.n: 文章; 论文[出现16次)];物件; 物品[出现1次)];[语法]冠词[出现0次)];事件[出现0次)]

sogou-CET6.n: 文章; 论文[出现10次)];物件; 物品(尤指整套中的一件)[出现0次)]

sogou-CET4.n: 文章; 论文[出现15次)];物件; 物品(尤指整套中的一件)[出现0次)]

1.en: But the article is to ask others to translate my classes, teachers do not mind!
1.cn: 但文章是请别人班我翻译的、老师请不要介意！

2.en: PS: Many thanks to one of my friends in London who recommended this article to me.
2.cn: 附：十分感谢伦敦的一位朋友向我推荐了这篇文章。

3.en: In the article it said that kids used to see bubbles forming from the dirt and would throw rocks at it to try and pop it.
3.cn: 文章说孩子们常常看见土里冒出气泡来，他们用石头砸气泡让它破裂。

0.en: Get them talking about anything but that goddamn article.
0.cn: 让他们谈什么都好，就是别谈那篇文章。

1.en: I'm sure they'll answer my calls once this article comes out.
1.cn: 相信等文章发布，他们会接我的电话的。

2.en: This is a Reuters article on the NSA. The NSA? Yeah.
2.cn: 这是篇路透社关于国家安全局的文章。国家安全局？对。

3.en: What are you guys talking about? There's a reception for my magazine article on Saturday.
3.cn: 你们在说什么？周六有场为我的杂志文章举行的招待会。

4.en: What are you reading? This article says the peak age for making a Nobel Prize-winning discovery is 40.
4.cn: 你在看什么？这文章说诺贝尔获奖者取得大发现的巅峰年纪是40岁。

5.en: Cleared? Please. The White House has not had a single press briefing since the Herald ran my article.
5.cn: 无罪？得了吧。白宫自《先驱报》刊登了我的文章，就没举行过一次新闻发布会。

6.en: You know, a Tom Hammerschmidt article used to be the first thing I would look for when I opened the Washington Herald.
6.cn: 汤姆·汉默施密特的文章以前是我打开《华盛顿先驱报》后，第一个要找的东西。

7.en: Will you comment on the Wall Street Telegraph article about Governor Conway's alleged interference with the House Intelligence Committee?
7.cn: 你是否可以就《华尔街电讯报》的文章指出康威州长可能干涉了众议院情报委员会做出评论？

8.en: I read an amusing article about, a Civil War re-enactor, who said that your great-great-grandfather killed a Yankee soldier with his bare hands.
8.cn: 我读过一篇有趣的文章，一个内战情景重现演员，他说你的曾曾祖父赤手杀了一名北方兵。

9.en: Tom. I understand you believe in the importance of your article. And I agreed to come here today and talk with you about it. But we're fighting to keep this country safe.
9.cn: 汤姆。我知道你相信你的文章很重要。我答应今天来跟你谈谈它。但我们正在奋力保护国家的安全。

10.en: I read an article in the paper the other day that said that although US teenagers are not the most sexually active, we have the highest rate of teenage pregnancy, okay?
10.cn: 有天，我读到一篇文章上面说，虽然美国青年并不算是最性活跃的，但我们的青少年怀孕率是最高的，知道吗？

11.en: Ooh, guess who's getting an article written about him in Physics Today?
11.cn: 哇哦，猜猜"今日物理"写了篇关于谁的报道？

12.en: Listen. There is no such thing as bad publicity, sweetheart. Read the article, babe.
12.cn: 听着，亲爱的，坏消息总比没消息好。你读读这篇报道啊，宝贝。

13.en: Which brings us to article 23 subsection C, please check here to reserve your spot at the ten year roommate reunion.
13.cn: 请看到第23条第C款，请在这里签名来预留十年后室友团聚会的位子。

14.en: I tried to ask him about it, and he invoked section three, article five of the marriage contract: beeswax comma none of your.
14.cn: 我试着问过他，但他引用了婚姻协议中的第3节第5条："屁事关你"。

15.en: Leonard, there's one more thing. Under Article One, Section Three of our Roommate Agreement, I'm calling an emergency meeting. No, you're not.
15.cn: 莱纳德，还有件事，根据我们的合租协议第一章第三段，我要召开一个紧急会议。你不是吧。

16.en: No, it's New York magazine. It's an article about the best schools in the city. So how well do you know Sting? I actually haven't even met him.
16.cn: 我在看《纽约杂志》报导城里最棒的学校。你跟史汀很熟吗？事实上我没有见过他。

17.en: Then one day on the treadmill, I was reading this article on Sociology Journal about how people don't start out lying to other people, they start out lying to themselve, and the things we repeat most frequently are often those lies.
17.cn: 有天在跑步机上，我正在读社会学杂志上的论文。上面写道，相比对他人撒谎，人们更喜欢对自己撒谎。而重复最多的那些话，通常就是谎言。
